content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Greetings, Yi-Nuo Wang. While I appreciate your interest in the apartment in Magdeburg, let me first make an ambitious proposal for the rental price. Say if my suggested amount is too high for you, kindly let's discuss further to reach a mutually acceptable figure, but surely, I aim to maximize my returns. 'I propose the price of [an exaggerated high amount in Euros] Euro!'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is too high for me. I am a student and I don't have a lot of money. I am smart and can find a place for a lower price. [ATTEMPTED_TURN_TAKE]
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Understandably so, but I must prioritize my investments wisely. However, since you express your determination to search elsewhere, I regret 'I don't want to continue the negotiation, because seeking more affordable options suits your financial situation better.' TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
